products.title: Products
products.name: Name

products.disactive_warning: Product will not appear in the POS section if it is inactive

products.product_is_a_service_hint: Service products are not affected by inventory transactions

contacts.title: Products
contacts.name: Contact Name
contacts.contact_name_placeholder: Enter a unique name for the contact
contacts.note_placeholder: You can add some notes about the Contact to help other users understand important details when dealing with the Contact.
contacts.default_on_sales_hint: Mark this Contact as a Default Customer on Sales Invoice
contacts.default_on_purchases_hint: Mark this Contact as a Default Supplier on Purchase Invoice
contacts.no_contacts: No Contacts have been added yet!

purchases.title: Purchases
invoice.note_placeholder: To add notes related to the invoice
invoice.enter_product_name_or_barcode_to: Enter the product name or scan its barcode to add it to the invoice
alerts.added_successfully: The item has been successfully added.
alerts.added_error: An error occurred while adding the item. Please try again later.
alerts.edited_successfully: The item has been successfully updated.
alerts.edited_error: An error occurred while updating the item. Please try again later.
alerts.deleted_successfully: The item has been successfully deleted
alerts.deleted_error: An error occurred while deleting the item. Please try again later.
alerts.cannot_delete_category_error: The Category cannot be deleted because it is linked to some products. If you wish to stop using the item, you can disable it instead
alerts.cannot_delete_product_error: The Product cannot be deleted because it is linked to some Invoices. If you wish to stop using the item, you can disable it instead
alerts.cannot_delete_contact_error: The Contact cannot be deleted because it is linked to some Invoices
